com.foodbook.foodbook
Class EditRecipeActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.foodbook.foodbook.TitleBarOverride
          com.foodbook.foodbook.EditRecipeActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
MakeRecipeActivity
public class EditRecipeActivity
extends TitleBarOverride

This activity is used to change details of a selected recipe. Only the owner of the recipe can access this recipe.

Author:
Jaeseo Park (jaeseo1), Jasmine Woo (jwoo), Nhu Bui (nbui), Robert Janes (rjanes)
See Also:
Recipe

openPhotoManager

protected void openPhotoManager()
Opens PhotoManager activity. Pictures belonging to the corresponding recipe, if there is any, will be sent to PhotoManager through intent.
